title: Chocolate fudge tart
ingredients: ['Pastry', '4 tbsp (36g) Plain Flour', '2 tbsp (8g) Cocoa powder', '1 tbsp (16g) Butter', 'Filling', 'Over half an egg', '1 tbsp (8g) Plain flour', '22g Dark chocolate', '1 tbsp (10g) Caster sugar', '1 tbsp (13g) Butter', 'Fudge', '1/2 tbsp (9g) butter', '1 1/2 tbsp (20g) sugar', '20ml milk']
